headline: Aon appoints John Neal as Global Chairman of Climate Solutions and Global CEO of Reinsurance
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, announced today the appointment of John Neal as Global Chairman of Climate Solutions and Global CEO of Reinsurance for Aon, effective following the conclusion of his notice period.
